name: The Grand Pumpky
description:
Hunt down the Grand Pumpky in this incredibly short pseudo run and gun. Avoid the specters that serve the mighty Ghoulstompulon- a spirit that exists souley to spite you in this specific instance. Aside from that, you guys are actually great friends and occasionally play Madden 2013 on the weekends (when Ghoulstompulon isn't hanging out with his partner, Patroclus).

Controls: WASD to move, I to shoot (if I is held your shooting will be fixed to the direction you last shot in until I is released), L to dash

Each time you beat the game and replay it it gets a bit faster, there is no cap to this and I hope someone can show me what's the highest this can possibly go.

In the event of you needing to reset all progress press I, C, U, P at the same time to reset your Death and Victory total. This can only be done from the menu before you begin the game.
